reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Nicaragua, all united holding the achievements and consolidating the actions aimed at pre-elimination and elimination of Malaria

description.narrative: Nicaragua - Malaria - Federación Red NICASALUD - NICASALUD. This program has the following goals: Reduce malaria cases by 90 percent by 2021.. Reduce the number of active foci by 84 percent by 2021.. Reduce the rate of positive malaria tests to 0.39 per 100 samples.. The objectives of this program are: Ensure universal access to prevention, diagnosis and treatment to eliminate malaria in Nicaragua.. Increase awareness of the epidemiological, parasitological and entomological surveillance system to reduce and eliminate the transmission foci and avoid the reintroduction of malaria at the local level.. Strengthen efforts toward becoming a country free from malaria transmission at the local level through innovation, research and certification.. Promote citizen engagement and strengthen comprehensive, cross-sector, interagency and cross-border activities, ensuring a setting that is conducive to eliminating malaria.
